body.p: The 2013 Discussion Paper identified cash-flow-based measurements as a separate category of measurement bases. The 2018 Conceptual Framework does not do so because the Board concluded that cash-flow-based measurements are not measurement bases in their own right. Instead, cash-flow-based measurement techniques can be used to estimate a measure in applying a specified measurement basis. Paragraphs 6.91â€“6.95 of the 2018 Conceptual Framework discuss how those techniques can be used in this way.
